櫻島.definition: Sakurajima, an active volcano in Kagoshima prefecture, Japan

櫻桃園.definition: The Cherry Orchard, a play by Chekhov 契訶夫|契诃夫[Qi4 he1 fu1]

櫻桃小口.definition: see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]

櫻桃小嘴.definition: lit. cherry mouth (idiom); fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth

櫻桃小番茄.definition: see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

櫻花.definition: oriental cherry (Prunus serrulata or Prunus yedoensis), prized for its blossom; also known as sakura (Japanese) or Yoshino cherry
